elements.text:
Your mortgage payment is due soon, and you also have to pay some unexpected medical bills. Your budget is tight this month, and you think about how you'll afford all of this.

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: I'll never be able to afford all of this.
This is a tough situation, but I won't have all of these expenses every month.
I have successfully dealt with financial challenges in the past and I can do it again now.
I can figure out a way to handle this.
I think that there is no solution to this problem, but I take a step back and think through my options.
